name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a feature or improvement
title: "[Feature] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Problem / Use Case

Describe the problem you're trying to solve or the use case you have in mind. Focus on the *why* before the *how*.

## Proposed Solution

How do you think this should work? Be as specific or general as makes sense at this stage.

## How This Aligns with Playshape's Philosophy

How does this feature support practice-driven, performance-first learning design? (See the project's [Philosophy](../../README.md#philosophy) section.)

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered other approaches? Why is this one better?

## Additional Context

Mockups, examples from other tools, links to research, or anything else that helps explain the idea.
